item.title: Crash when trying to open VS2010 Beta 2 Help: MSHelpListener.exe has stopped working
item.description: Update: There is a Microsoft Connect bug logged for this here. Update 2: “R0b0tz” has got the workaround for this on his blog.

item.title: Update: Ericsson F3507g Mobile Broadband on Windows 7 with Lenovo Thinkpad
item.description: It’s become clear from comments on my previous article, that Lenovo have released a new Windows 7 driver for the Ericsson F3507g Mobile Broadband card.

item.title: Workaround for VisualStateManager.GoToState not working on Window

item.title: How to get Ericsson F3507g Mobile Broadband card working on Windows 7 & Lenovo Thinkpad T400s
item.description: Update: A new driver has been released which uses the Windows 7 Mobile Broadband driver framework. Please see my new article.

item.title: Fix for Windows 7 "random wake from sleep" problem
item.description: For the last few months I’ve had Windows 7 RC installed on two home computers, and both of them have exhibited a strange problem: They would randomly wake from sleep .
